config.tectonic.option.carvers_enabled.t:
Whether old caves/ravines should generate.
§cGame restart required!
config.tectonic.option.cheese_additive.t: Density added to cheese caves. Lower values = bigger cheese caves.
config.tectonic.option.cheese_enabled.to: The standard expansive, large cheese-shaped caves.
Horizontally scales continents. Lower values = larger continents and oceans between them.
0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
config.tectonic.option.depth_cutoff_size: The distance in depth between the start and end of the depth cutoff. 0.1 means caves close over ~12 blocks, 0.0 means caves cut off at the `depth_cutoff_start` value immediately.
config.tectonic.option.depth_cutoff_star: The depth noise value that caves stop generating. 0.1 cuts off caves ~12 blocks below the surface, 0.5 cuts off caves ~64 blocks below the surface.
config.tectonic.option.enabled.tooltip:
Islands with vanilla mountainous terrain dot the oceans.
§6With Terralith installed, these spawn volcanoes!
config.tectonic.option.erosion_scale.too: Horizontally scales erosion, primarily impacting mountains. Lower values = thicker mountain ranges and terrain between them.
config.tectonic.option.flat_terrain_skew: The threshold where plateau terrain becomes flatter terrain. Positive numbers favor flat terrain and negative numbers favor plateau terrain.
Increases the max build and generation height to y640.
config.tectonic.option.jungle_pillars.to: Some jungles generate massive pillars that can extend upwards of a hundred blocks tall.
config.tectonic.option.lava_tunnels.tool: Rare, deep underground tunnels of lava sometimes generate at the bottom of the world.
config.tectonic.option.mod_enabled.toolt:
When disabled, the mod lays dormant and does nothing.
§cGame restart required!
config.tectonic.option.monument_offset.t: Offsets (vanilla) ocean monuments to adjust for deeper oceans.
Multipliers the island noise, making normal and mushroom islands more common.
config.tectonic.option.noise_offset.tool: Offsets the island noise. Higher values favor normal islands, lower values favor mushroom islands.
config.tectonic.option.noise_scale.toolt: Horizontally scales islands. Lower values = larger islands and oceans between them.
config.tectonic.option.noodle_additive.t: Density added to noodle caves. Lower values = bigger noodle caves.
config.tectonic.option.ocean_depth.toolt: 0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
config.tectonic.option.ocean_offset.tool:
Skews terrain towards or away from oceans. Lower values = more oceans.
§cAbove -0.45, deep oceans will not spawn!
§4Above -0.2, oceans will not spawn!
config.tectonic.option.remove_frozen_oce: Removes the surface ice from Frozen Oceans, making them as navigable as Deep Frozen Oceans.
config.tectonic.option.ridge_scale.toolt: Horizontally scales the ridge noise, primarily impacting rivers and terrain around them like plateaus. Lower values = wider rivers and terrain between them.
config.tectonic.option.river_lanterns.to: Underground rivers will rarely generate with hanging lanterns.
config.tectonic.option.rolling_hills.too: Some Plains biomes generate very smooth, hilly terrain.
config.tectonic.option.snow_start_offset: Offsets the y-level snow in cold biomes like Taigas starts at.
config.tectonic.option.spaghetti_enabled: The tunneling, medium sized spaghetti-shaped caves.
config.tectonic.option.temperature_multi: Multiplies the temperature noise, causing extreme cold/warm biomes (snowy biomes, deserts) to be favored.
config.tectonic.option.temperature_offse: Offsets the average value of the temperature noise. Higher values favor more deserts/warm biomes, lower values favor more snowy/cold biomes.
config.tectonic.option.temperature_scale: Horizontally scales the temperature noise. Lower values = larger distance between biomes of different temperatures.
config.tectonic.option.ultrasmooth.toolt:
Greatly smoothens out the terrain like Tectonic v2, removing staircasing artifacts at the cost of strange/broken generation in deep oceans and windswept biomes.
§cGame restart required on 1.20!
config.tectonic.option.underground_river: Rivers that reach mountain ranges continue underground, allowing smoother boat exploration.
config.tectonic.option.vegetation_multip: Multiplies the vegetation noise, causing extreme dry/humid biomes (sunflower plains, dark forests) to be favored.
config.tectonic.option.vegetation_offset: Offsets the average value of the vegetation noise. Higher values favor more densely vegetated biomes, lower values favor more sparsely vegetated biomes.
Horizontally scales the vegetation noise. Lower values = larger distance between biomes of different humidities (e.g. savannas and jungles).
config.tectonic.option.vertical_scale.to:
Vertically stretches terrain above sea level. Doubling this value will double the surface's height at a given point from sea level.
§cGame restart required on 1.20!
config.tectonic.title: Tectonic Config
preset.tectonic.title: Presets
